mapper.select: select u.id from users u left join disruptive_customers d on u.user_id = d.user_id where u.id like CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%') and (d.restriction_status != '제한됨' or d.restriction_status is null);
mapper.insert: insert into disruptive_customers(restriction_reason,restriction_status,user_id) select '제한됨', #{restrictionReason},u.user_id from users u where u.id = #{id};
